website_summaries.verdict: Offering loads of handy features and a sturdy bamboo construction, this affordable bathtub caddy comes at a very reasonable price without cutting corners on quality.
pros: Extendable arms have a long reach that easily fits most bathtubs
Rubber pads do a good job of keeping it in place
Made from natural bamboo and finished with lacquer for added water-resistance
With a book or tablet stand, wine-glass slot, and a generous sunken tray for a phone or other items, it holds everything necessary for an indulgent soak
cons: It's a bit narrower than some, but for most this isn't a deal breaker

customer_reviews.title: Quality and thoughtful finishes
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t be happier with this product! As you can see I have a large spa tub, but it extends to fit perfectly. The stand has an adjustable wooden “foot” to hold items upright and the rubber grips hold it sturdily in place on the edges of the tub. My cat already has used it as his personal bridge and it didn’t even shake or bow at all. The only slight problem is that the stand alone will not hold book pages open, but I used a cheap elastic headband and it works perfectly! You could also use any bookmark designed to hold your pages open. Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: born2BHis

customer_reviews.title: Built in tablet holder

This tray makes it so much better than I remember! There is a built-in tablet holder, which is great if you enjoy bingeing Netflix in the tub.
